arts.ttl: Sean Parrish on another poor day for Shrewsbury Town
arts.sum: "I've said to them, I'm disappointed with the goals, the manner we conceded. And Parrish said he was disappointed for them after the performance and result Town produced.

arts.ttl: Burton finally off the mark after win over fellow strugglers Shrewsbury
arts.sum: Both sides are without a manager.

arts.ttl: Shrewsbury Town will always have a special place in my heart
arts.sum: In a classy statement via the League Managers Association, Hurst said he was delighted his side managed to maintain their League One status at the end of last season but acknowledged results have been hard to come by this term. "It is with sadness that I write this, now my time at Shrewsbury Town has come to an end," Hurst said via the LMA.

arts.ttl: Former QPR boss among contenders for Shrewsbury Town job – Stockport County figure also eyed
arts.sum: QPR sacked Gareth Ainsworth in October 2023 and now, he’s among the contenders for the Shrewsbury Town job,… The post Former QPR boss among contenders for Shrewsbury Town job – Stockport County figure also eyed appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
